dmca.title: Mesotheliomaweb complains of text metastasizing again
dmca.body:
Sir/Madam:

I write to complain about an AdSense publisher who has copied a website from one of my clients.

1.	The copyrighted work at issue is text that appears on the website Mesotheliomaweb.org on several pages.

2. The pages that infringe: http://cancerknowledge.blogspot.com/2005/09/intensitymodulatedradiationtherapy.html is a copy of http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/stevens.htm

http://cancerknowledge.blogspot.com/2005/09/mesothelioma-patients-people-with.html is a copy of http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/fighters.htm#belle

http://naturalrelaxers.blogspot.com/2005/08/mesothelioma-financial-assistance.html is a copy of
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/peace.htm

http://whatismesothelioma.blogspot.com/2005/01/mesothelioma.html is a copy of http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/mesothelioma.htm

http://senseofmicro.blogspot.com/2005/06/questionaboutmesothelioma.html is a copy of http://www.mesotbeliomaweb.org/mesothelioma.htm

http://mesothelioma-online.blogspot.com/2005/03/commonquestions.html is a copy of http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/mesothelioma.htm

http://mesotheliomal990.blogspot.com/2005/01/mesothelioma.html is a copy of http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/mesothelioma.htm

http://a1-mesothelioma-asbestos.blogspot.com contains a copy of http://www.mesotheliornaweb.org/doctor-patient.htm if you scroll down to one of the August 15, 2005 entries.

3. My name is [private]. My e-mail address is [private]@sitecoach.com.

4. According to the registrar Markmonitor.com the owner of this site is:

Google Inc.
(DOM345046)
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway Mountain View
CA
94043 US

Domain Name: blogspot.corn

Registrar Name: Markmonitor,corn
Registrar Whois: whois.rnarkmonitor.coiii
Registrar Homepage: http://www.markmonitor.com

	Administrative Contact:
DNS Admin
(NIC1467103)
Google Inc.
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway Mountain View
CA
94043 US
dns-admin@google.com +1.6502530000 Fax +1.6506188571

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,
[private]
